name: Shakir❤️😍
greetingText: I really like your name Muthe😘!
wishText: May the allha bless you. Allah prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Shakir❤️!! Yeee! Many many more happy...
text2: That's what I was going to do.

outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
